title: Collaborative Digital Textbook (cDTB) Design and Utilization: Language Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital device usage skills and foundational grasp of language learning principles
context.additional_context: Students collaborate on language projects in digital device-supported environments, constructing knowledge through multimodal expressions (text, images, audio, etc.)

learning_goals: Students can design and execute language learning projects using collaborative digital textbooks (cDTB).
Learners enhance their ability to create and share language content by utilizing multimodal representations (text, images, audio, video).
Through team-based activities, learners can apply and evaluate effective collaborative learning strategies in digital environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
